means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 布兰德来源于日耳曼语人名，含义是“剑”(sword)
[地名] [奥地利、德国、捷克共和国、美国] 布兰德

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含有"商标"之意。
means: brand ： 指生产厂家为自己的产品所取的专用名称。
trademark ： 指通过合法注册而印在商品上的特殊标记，即商标。

sentence.Network_en: But that doesn't mean this brand of politics is dead or dying.
sentence.Network_cn: 但那并不意味着这种政治主张已经或正在消亡。

sentence.Network_en: The Sunday Times remains the brand leader by a huge margin.
sentence.Network_cn: 《星期日泰晤士报》仍以巨大的优势稳居报业龙头的地位。

sentence.Network_en: It would be uneconomical to send a brand new tape.
sentence.Network_cn: 寄一盘新磁带过去不合算。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 品牌（brand）(BRAND)，英文的本意是“烙印”的意思，是自然经济时代放牧主打上的财产归属标记，以区分与他人的财物。现代品牌（brand）是19世纪 …

2013年英语四级词汇表(背诵)_百度文库 ... branch n. 树枝；分部；分科 brand n. 商品；烙印 abstract a. 抽象的 n.摘要.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  brand 'burning' (also in sense 3), of Germanic origin; related to German Brand, also to burnThe verb sense 'mark permanently with a hot iron' dates from late Middle English , giving rise to the noun sense 'a mark of ownership made by branding' (mid 17th cent.), whence sense 1 (early 19th cent.)

encyclopedia.content: brand n.[C] 商标；牌子 1) 商标；牌子[(+of)] This brand of tea is my favorite. 这种茶我最爱喝。 2) 锛埬橙颂赜械娘級一种锛埛绺瘢僦沟蕊級[(+of)] He has his own brand of humor. 他有他独特的幽默。 3) 锛埣倚笊砩媳昝魉舻娘級烙印；锛埦墒钡娘級罪犯烙印 4) 耻辱的标记，污名 The brand of a coward is a liability in a military career. 懦夫的污名对戎马生涯是不利的。 5) 燃烧锛埢蛏战癸級的木头 6)【书】火炬；

entry.def: A brand of a product is the version of it that is made by one particular manufacturer.

example.ex: Winston is a brand of cigarette...
I bought one of the leading brands.
example.tran: 我买了几个畅销品牌中的一种。

entry.def: A brand of something such as a way of thinking or behaving is a particular kind of it.

example.ex: The British brand of socialism was more interested in reform than revolution.
example.tran: 英国式的社会主义更加注重改革，而不是革命。

entry.def: If someone is branded as something bad, people think they are that thing.

example.ex: I was instantly branded as a rebel...
example.tran: 转眼间我被诬蔑为叛徒。

example.ex: The company has been branded racist by some of its own staff...
example.tran: 一些内部员工谴责这家公司具有种族主义倾向。

entry.def: When you brand an animal, you put a permanent mark on its skin in order to show who it belongs to, usually by burning a mark onto its skin.

example.ex: The owner couldn't be bothered to brand the cattle.

entry.def: A brand is a permanent mark on the skin of an animal, which shows who it belongs to.

means.word_mean: 1. a name given to a product or service

sentences.sentence: "there's a new brand of hero in the movies now"

means.word_mean: 3. identification mark on skin, made by burning
4. a piece of wood that has been burned or is burning
5. a symbol of disgrace or infamy;

sentences.sentence: "And the Lord set a mark upon Cain"--Genesis

means.word_mean: 6. a cutting or thrusting weapon with a long blade
1. burn with a branding iron to indicate ownership; of animals
2. to accuse or condemn or openly or formally or brand as disgraceful;

sentences.sentence: "She was stigmatized by society because she had a child out of wedlock"

example.en: Look at that brand spanking new car!
Max smokes nothing but those off-brand cigarette.
example.zh: 麦克斯除了那种大麻烟，什么也不抽。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 商标, 牌子, 烙印
stems_affixes.word_buile: brand燃烧→烧出来[的牌子]→商标,烙印
brand燃烧→烧出来[的牌子]→商标,烙印

Sentence.sentence: But Oprah's particular brand of celebrity is not a good fit for the values of a university whose motto(座右铭),Veritas,means truth.
Unfortunately,many American universities seem awfully busy protecting their brand name and not nearly busy enough protecting the pursuit of knowledge
Thus, wearing the right brand of clothes or shoes may be of the utmost importance.

sentences.en: What is your favourite brand of cigarettes?
sentences.cn: 你最喜欢哪种牌子的香烟?

sentences.en: These cattle have my brand on them.
sentences.cn: 这些牛身上打了烙印, 标明是我的牛。

means.word_mean: 打烙印于, 以烙铁打

sentences.cn: 我们已经给我们的牛打上了烙印。

sentences.en: His unhappy childhood has branded him for life.
sentences.cn: 他不愉快的童年在他心灵上留下了终生的烙印。

sentences.en: The press branded him a liar.
sentences.cn: 报界给他加上了说谎者的臭名。

means.word_mean: 污辱；给…抹黑，给…打上耻辱的标记，使蒙受耻辱

sentences.en: Her criminal record branded her for life.
sentences.cn: 她的犯罪记录使她终生蒙受耻辱。

means.word_mean: 标明…与众不同，使显得独一无二，使显得别具一格

sentences.en: Her high style brands her as newfashioned.
sentences.cn: 她的服装的时髦式样标明她是个新派人。
